# awesome-wrap



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                     | Description                                       |
| ------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------- |
| `--container-background` | Background of the inner container                 |
| `--container-padding`    | Padding of the inner container                    |
| `--lg`                   | The view breakpoint for lg. (Default: 960)        |
| `--md`                   | The view breakpoint for md. (Default: 720)        |
| `--outer-lg`             | The outer view breakpoint of lg. (Default: 992)   |
| `--outer-md`             | The outer view breakpoint of md. (Default: 768)   |
| `--outer-sm`             | The outer view breakpoint of sm. (Default: 576)   |
| `--outer-xl`             | The outer view breakpoint of xl. (Default: 1200)  |
| `--outer-xs`             | The outer view breakpoint of xs. (Default: 0)     |
| `--outer-xxl`            | The outer view breakpoint of xxl. (Default: 1400) |
| `--sm`                   | The view breakpoint for sm. (Default: 540)        |
| `--xl`                   | The view breakpoint for xl. (Default: 1140)       |
| `--xs`                   | The view breakpoint for xs. (Default: 0)          |
| `--xxl`                  | The view breakpoint for xxl. (Default: 1320)      |
